statements: UPDATE climate_disasters SET severity = 5 WHERE disaster_id = 10;
UPDATE climate_disasters SET description = 'Heavy rainfall and flooding' WHERE location = 'California';
UPDATE climate_disasters SET severity = 6, description = 'Severe hurricane causing widespread damage' WHERE disaster_id = 101
UPDATE climate_disasters SET location = 'California', date_occurred = '2022-03-15' WHERE disaster_type = 'Wildfire'
UPDATE hurricanes SET intensity = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wildfires SET area_affected = 250.75, date = '2022-08-15' WHERE name = 'California Wildfire';
UPDATE hurricanes SET intensity = 5, location = 'Miami' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wildfires SET area_affected = 300.75, date = '2022-05-10', name = 'California Wildfire' WHERE location = 'California';
UPDATE hurricanes SET location='Florida', severity='high' WHERE hurricane_id=1;
UPDATE wildfires SET containment_status='uncontrolled', start_date='2022-09-15' WHERE wildfire_id=3;
UPDATE hurricanes SET severity='high' WHERE year=2020;
UPDATE floods SET severity='low', affected_area=5000.50 WHERE flood_id=100;
UPDATE hurricanes SET location='Florida', date='2022-08-31' WHERE name='Hurricane Delta';
UPDATE floods SET severity='High', affected_area='City A' WHERE name='Flood X';
UPDATE hurricanes SET location = 'Florida', date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wildfires SET region = 'California', acres_burned = 15000.75 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE hurricanes SET category = 3, affected_area = 'Florida' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wildfires SET containment_status = 'Under Control', acres_burned = 5000 WHERE location = 'California';
UPDATE hurricanes SET category = 5, affected_area = 'Coastal Region' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE floods SET affected_population = 10000, severity = 3, location = 'River Valley' WHERE id = 2;
